txt.en:
'Hail, friend! I hope you are enjoying the festival.

'You wouldn't happen to be on your way to Combe, would you? You see, my friend Gail lives there now, and she recently lost many of her belongings in the tragedy that befell Archet. I wanted to give this bracelet to her as a gift, in the hope that it would raise her spirits in these troubling times.

'Would you be so kind as to take this to her?'
'Hello there!\n\n'Oh, what is this? You have something for me? How beautiful!'
'Have you found Gail in Combe yet? Just head east out of Bree, then take the road north at the fork.'

Roger Hazeltwig desires to spread the joy of the celebration to his friend, Gail Catchpole.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Deliver the bracelet to Gail Catchpole in Combe
Gail Catchpole is in Combe.\n\nRoger Hazeltwig has asked you to deliver a lovely bracelet to Gail Catchpole, in the hopes that the gift will brighten her mood.
Deliver the bracelet to Gail Catchpole in Combe
